data.text:
@DonnaBeamish @DonnaBeamish, we apologise for your experience outlined. We'd love the opportunity to offer feedback. Kindly share a direct message so we may better assist. Looking forward to hearing from you. 

-Kezia

Question:  How can I find out information about my upcoming flight? 

 Answer: Stay in the know, for free, with Caribbean Flight Notifications. Get  email updates and instant texts for flight changes, delays, cancellations and more!

 #REcalibrated #iflycaribbean ✈️ https://t.co/RZY5pk3jnG

@sunkissed_jules @sunkissed_jules - Thank you for reaching out to us. We do apologize for any inconvenience caused to you. Are you still receiving such messages? Kindly Private message us with details of your experience so that we may review. Once again, we do apologize.

- Lucie
